video.title: Graceland
video.synopsis: Joining forces in their undercover efforts, a group of agents from the FBI, DEA and U.S. Customs move into a beachfront house in Southern California.

episodes.synopsis: A rookie FBI agent is assigned to Graceland, a seized beachfront home that now serves as an undercover residence for FBI, DEA and customs agents.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When ongoing investigations clash, Briggs and Mike use the opportunity to pit rival gangs against each other; Mike wrestles with moral complications.
episodes.title: Guadalajara Dog

episodes.synopsis: Briggs calls on the house to help Lauren with her case against the Russian mafia; Charlie gets into hot water when her informant proves unreliable.
episodes.title: Heat Run

episodes.synopsis: A Nigerian drug lord recruits Mike to teach gang members how to shoot well; Paige enlists Jakes and Tuturro to go undercover with a female pot farmer.
episodes.title: Pizza Box

episodes.synopsis: Mike gets deeper into Bello's organization; Briggs and Charlie resume their identities as a sexually charged couple to get intel on a drug supplier.
episodes.title: O-Mouth

episodes.synopsis: Mike convinces Bello to steal from the most powerful drug cartel in Southern California and calls on Johnny's unique underwater skills to help.
episodes.title: Hair of the Dog

episodes.synopsis: Charlie decides to tell the house that she used heroin while undercover. Meanwhile, Briggs is finally forced to come clean to Mike.
episodes.title: Goodbye High

episodes.synopsis: The newly formed Briggs-Bello alliance is tested when members of the Caza cartel head north with a deadly ultimatum.
episodes.title: Bag Man

episodes.synopsis: Bello's last strike to the Caza cartel sets a war in motion that Graceland now must stop; while on her hunt for Odin, Charlie meets an unusual ally.
episodes.title: Smoke Alarm

episodes.synopsis: Tempers flare when Charlie discovers a secret about Briggs and begins working with a federale to find the truth; Mike discovers that Juan is missing.
episodes.title: King's Castle

episodes.synopsis: As Mike looks into Juan's disappearance, he and Briggs play a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse, forcing Briggs to make a decision about his future.
episodes.title: Happy Endings

episodes.synopsis: Caza enforcer Jangles takes a member of Graceland hostage, and the house must come together to save one of their own from a sadistic killer.
episodes.title: Pawn

episodes.synopsis: When a cartel puts out a hit on Mike Warren, he returns to Graceland for a special undercover mission -- but things have changed.
episodes.title: The Line

episodes.synopsis: Briggs digs up an old criminal connection to his dark past to help Mike get information on the cartel that tried to kill him.
episodes.title: Connects

episodes.synopsis: Mike puts everyone's skills to use in finding the bus line that's smuggling drugs into the States, but Jakes may be more of a liability than a help.
episodes.title: Tinker Bell

episodes.synopsis: Briggs and Charlie engage in risky behavior to atone for past misdeeds; a night of clubbing forces Tuturro to examine how far he'll go for a case.
episodes.title: Magic Number

episodes.synopsis: A visitor to Graceland upends the power dynamics and puts Mike in a precarious spot; Tuturro risks his undercover position with Carlito to help Lucia.
episodes.title: H-a-Double-P-Y

episodes.synopsis: Paige's pursuit of the drug mules leads her to a terrifying encounter with human traffickers; Mike ignores protocol to get answers about the case.
episodes.title: The Unlucky One

episodes.synopsis: Mike faces his biggest enemy and vows to do whatever is necessary to take him down, even if it means pushing the boundaries of the law.
episodes.title: Los Malos

episodes.synopsis: Charlie attempts to form a bond with a bank robber, while Johnny tries to keep his feelings for a cartel leader's daughter in check.
episodes.title: The Ends

episodes.synopsis: Johnny meets the head of one of the most dangerous drug cartels in Mexico and pitches an alternative means of trafficking drugs.
episodes.title: Gratis

episodes.synopsis: Briggs and Paige decide that Mike is willing to push the boundaries too far, so they plan on using Briggs's undercover to end Mike's operation.
episodes.title: The Head of the Pig

episodes.synopsis: Briggs learns that someone in Graceland has evidence of his past crimes, and he decides to do whatever he must to take that person down.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Even as the agents bait their final hooks against the Solano cartel, it dawns on them that Sid may still have a few tricks of his own.
episodes.title: Echoes

episodes.synopsis: As the arrests of Sid and the Solanos near, the FBI receives a bomb threat, and Johnny and Lucia are thrust into danger.
episodes.title: Faith 7
